name: Smooth Criminal
description:
The time has come for you to prove yourself the smoothest criminal around! Sneak, steal, and kill your way through 13 dangerous levels in this slick action-platformer. All you have to do is get the target and get out... easy, right?

Content warning: cartoon violence with some blood.

Controls:

-Keyboard-
A/D - Move
Space - Jump
Left Shift - Dodge
Q - Kick
E - Drop/Detonate Explosive
Z - Sword
X - Shoot

-Gamepad-
Left Stick - Move
A - Jump
B - Dodge
X - Kick
Y - Drop/Detonate Explosive
LB - Sword
RB - Shoot

Known Issues:
Last 2 levels are broken, but maybe beatable
Sometimes zombies happen :(
You can pretty easily get out of bounds
